concept.title: End-to-end scenario
concept.shortdesc: There are a number of messaging patterns that identify common message flows that are used in messaging solutions. Use the following messaging pattern to help identify your messaging needs, and then use the scenario to get up and running quickly.

conbody.p: The following steps must be considered, understood, and completed to set up a messaging solution architecture.

ol.li: Understand your publish/subscribe, or point-to-point architecture.
Understand the messaging behavior that you require.

conbody.p: The following topic provides more detailed information about how to plan, and configure a solution for a scenario where multiple publisher devices broadcast messages to a number of subscribers.
